keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Youths threw rocks at riot police officers, who withdrew from the area without making any arrests, the authorities said.
snippet: Youths threw rocks at riot police officers, who withdrew from the area without making any arrests, the authorities said.
abstract: Greek police clash with migrants and refugees at border with Macedonia; thousands of migrants have initiated protests, and have refused order to move to organized shelters.
